name: Disallow_EBR_Section
action: <*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Experion Backup & Restore (Experion Server),Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F),Number of Network Storage Device - Standard(0-100),Header_11_open,Header_11_close,Server Node Type EBR,EBR Server)*><*SETOPTIONAL(Experion Backup & Restore (Experion Server),Experion Backup & Restore (Flex Station ES-F),Number of Network Storage Device - Standard(0-100))*>
description: This rule disallows the entire EBR section
